listitem.para: Nina Amenta, Dominique Attali, and Olivier Devillers. Complexity of Delaunay triangulation for points on lower-dimensional polyhedra. In Proc. 18th ACM-SIAM Sympos. Discrete Algorithms, pages 11061113, 2007.
Dominique Attali and Jean-Daniel Boissonnat. Complexity of the Delaunay triangulation of points on polyhedral surfaces. Discrete and Computational Geometry, 30(3):437452, 2003.
